title: Nautical-themed furnishings to bring any room out of its shell
text:
Riviera dressing table by Linley £45,000

Inspired by the yachting in the Côte d'Azur, this sophisticated design has a high gloss finish and mother-of-pearl inlaid brass handles. davidlinley.com

Bowater shelf by Jan Hendzel Studio from £195

The ripple feature references the studio's proximity to the Thames, while the name of the collection is an Anglo-Saxon term for someone who lives on the riverbank. janhendzel.com

PLANE + Choppy side table by Temper Studio £1,200

Handcrafted from English sycamore, this side table has a sculptural surface influenced by a clipper race across the Pacific Ocean. temperstudio.com

Belles Rives tray by Rita Konig for The Lacquer Company from £175

This bold design takes stimulus from the sea view at the Belles Rives hotel in Antibes. thelacquercompany.co.uk

Aqua chintz silk cushion by Bivain £105

Featuring an Indian-chintz inspired pattern, this cushion portrays sea life and corals that blossom like flowers. bazaar-london.com

Marine armchair by AltaModa £2,090

Handmade in Italy with a poplar plywood frame and upholstered in a colourful sea-themed cotton. artemest.com

Blue fish wallpaper by Sian Zeng from £189

Taken from original artwork and printed on to a non-woven material, this playful design is great for children's bedrooms. sianzeng.com

Silver plated clam shell with spoon by Matilda Goad £150

Bring glamour to the table with this delicate serving vessel, perfect for seasonings and condiments. matildagoad.com

Moorish rug by Amy Kent from £750 per sq m

In collaboration with Rapture and Wright, this rug is based on the textile brand's “Moorish Maze” fabric, in turn inspired by artist Richard Long's 1994 work, “White River Line”. amykent.co.uk

Vintage majolica platter from Ceraudo £65

A vintage design featuring a basket weave pattern and six oyster shells. ceraudo.com

Ottago sea cushion by Livio De Simone £170

The uneven geometric pattern alludes to the cyclic motion of waves, with the different shades referencing the colours of the ocean itself. artemest.com

Ceramic shell vase by Spicer and Wood from £18

Available in two sizes, this unglazed design is an elegant way to display flowers and dried foliage. spicerandwood.co.uk
